com.ece.superkids.users

Interface UserDatabase

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileUserDatabase

    public interface UserDatabase
    The UserDatabase class is an interface for for the FileUserDatabase class. It has functions to add, delete, update and get users by serializing/deserializing files from the database.
    Author:
    Marc Adam
     

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteUser(String name)
      Delete the file for the user.
      ArrayList<User> getAllUsers()
      Get all the users in the database, deserialize all files in .superkidsdata.
      User getUser(String name)
      Get the user from a file by deserializing the file.
      void saveUser(User user)
      Save the user to a file using serialization.
      void updateUser(User oldUser, User newUser)
      Update the serialized file of the user.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        User getUser(String name)
        Get the user from a file by deserializing the file.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user to get.
        Returns:
        User object deserialized.

      • getAllUsers

        ArrayList<User> getAllUsers()
        Get all the users in the database, deserialize all files in .superkidsdata.
        Returns:
        List of users.

      • saveUser

        void saveUser(User user)
        Save the user to a file using serialization. The user is saved in name.ser
        Parameters:
        user - User to be saved in the file.

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(User oldUser,
              User newUser)
        Update the serialized file of the user.
        Parameters:
        oldUser - User to update.
        newUser - User to be updated to.

      • deleteUser

        boolean deleteUser(String name)
        Delete the file for the user.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the user.
        Returns:
        File deleted successfully.
